General.Name: Hensel Davest Indonesia Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Hensel Davest Indonesia Tbk engages in the financial technology and electronic commerce business in Indonesia. It offers DavestPay mobile application for digital product purchase, billing payment, ticket reservation, and store payment. The company also provides artificial intelligence as a service in e-commerce platforms for business owners; and DoeKu, a platform that lends money in peer-to-peer lending market. In addition, it engages in information, communication, finance consulting, insurance, trading, and consulting businesses, as well as offers payment gateway and switching services. PT Hensel Davest Indonesia Tbk was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Makassar, Indonesia.
General.Address: Gedung Graha Pena Lt 17 Kav. 1701, Makassar, Indonesia, 90234
